document.full_text: high unemployment is not a "quickly resolvable problem," but april's job gains show the economic recovery is on a firmer footing, a top federal reserve policymaker said on wednesday.
document.title: job market has long way to go, fed's pianalto says
lines_and_colors: high unemployment is not a "quickly resolvable problem," but april's job gains show the economic recovery is on a firmer footing, a top federal reserve policymaker said on wednesday.
